Every single cs player has the same dry "scream in your face" humor that they somehow deem hilarious. Makes it nearly unbearable to solo queue. At its core its a great FPS game, probably one of the best of all time. 5/5. Game, 0/5 community.

Short gameplay story (100h): 
-started playing again with a group of friends
-some didn't have prime, every game cheaters, not even hiding (wh, aim, spinbots..)
-everybody got prime, every 2nd game cheater, bad at hiding, they get banned, make a new acc
-they ban them in few days (notification), you stay deranked 
How is it still possible to get cheats so easy?!
Don't start playing, you'll regret it. NP

*update: It's better now, mostly, if u got prime and no1 has low trust factor.. MGrank

Complete dumpster of a great game, due to lack of care from devs who really think competitve gameplay should be played with hackers. even on the ESEA/FACEIT 50% of players cheat/stream/youtube it. the whole competitive aspect of this game has been run to the ground, and if you wish to play as a new player, you will never have a good time, out of 85 in the past weeks. only 3 did not have cheaters. it fills the community servesrs, the public servers, the matchmaking servers. complete run down. hackers have been an issue since first day, and have only been made easier to obtain, and with a free game doesnt even matter if you get banned just make a new account and your rearing to run around and look at the floor and proceed to headshot everything that you never even looked at. 
CSGO IN A NUT SHELL
Sinir hastası olmak isteyenlere önerimdir bu oyun. Rusça geliştirir ama rusları sevdirmez iyi günler.

Counter Strike Global Offensive is a concrete follow up to CS Source. With constant updates and smooth gameplay it is near the perfect online shooter. But lets start with the bad points, first of all the game is riddled with hacks which can ruin a ranked game as you are either forced to leave and accept a penalty or carry on playing through the practically unbeatable round. This is probably the worst aspect of the game

This said CSGO is one of the few games that has made E-sports what it is today, it is a fair game that you can just pick up and play (if you don't count hackers). And always leave you wanting just one more game.


Conclusion - Not a game for everyone and can be frustrating at times however is definitely one of the defining FPS games out there and if you enjoy it the first time you play it, it will keep bringing you back for hours of fun.

-Tommy Ice
This is by far on my least favorite game from Valve, and way to sellout by adding battle royale.
